name: Gregory G. BELEY, Petitioner, v. STANDARD SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATION OF WILKINSBURG, PA. v. CENTURY 21 METRO REALTY EAST, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Beley v. Standard Savings & Loan Ass'n

judges: MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Rule of Judicial Administration 701(f).
parties: Gregory G. BELEY, Petitioner, v. STANDARD SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATION OF WILKINSBURG, PA. v. CENTURY 21 METRO REALTY EAST, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 9th day of November, 1995, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and the case Remanded to the Superior Court for consideration of appeal as a case stated, based on the admissions and stipulated facts set forth in the Trial Court’s Adjudication.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Rule of Judicial Administration 701(f).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
668 A.2d 1112
Gregory G. BELEY, Petitioner, v. STANDARD SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATION OF WILKINSBURG, PA. v. CENTURY 21 METRO REALTY EAST, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 9, 1995.
